algorithm_entity.name: Semantically-Aligned Equation Generator
algorithm_entity.task: Solving and Reasoning Math Word Problems

parameter_tuning: Hidden state size of LSTM set to 256

feature_processing: Bidirectional LSTM for constant representation extraction

dataset_entity.name: Math23K
dataset_entity.description: Contains 23,162 math problems with annotated equations

metric_entity.name: Accuracy
metric_entity.description: Proportion of correctly solved math word problems
metric_entity.formula: Number of correct solutions / Total number of problems
